Posts.Content: Thanks for the tips. I am brand new to Inspire and while I am thrilled to have found this site, I do find certain things about it a bit confusing. One question off the top of my head is whether or not we get some sort of notification if someone replies to a comment we make on someone else’s post. If so, where would we find it? For example, you posted the main comment on this topic. I am replying here. If someone chooses to answer my question, how am I notified (so I can be sure to find the response)? Does that make sense? I haven’t posted anything myself yet. I’ve just been reading the posts people write that interest me, along with the various responses. I’ve actually learned a great deal already and have gotten some good advice through the grapevine. I’m in the process of writing a bit about myself right now so that if people go to my main page they can find out a little bit about me. I’m thinking of starting a journal of my own here as well. I like the sense of community here, and the level of support everyone seems to get. Having an invisible disease can be very isolating and it’s wonderful to be connected with others that can relate to what I’m going through. Peace & love, Christine
Posts.Title: Inspire's Amazing Ability To Share In Multiple Groups
